actor.actor_id: Table: actor - Description: stores actor data including first name and last name. - Column: actor_id - Detail: a unique id that corresponds to a specific actor
actor.first_name: Table: actor - Description: stores actor data including first name and last name. - Column: first_name - Detail: first name of an actor
actor.last_name: Table: actor - Description: stores actor data including first name and last name. - Column: last_name - Detail: last name of an actor
actor.last_update: Table: actor - Description: stores actor data including first name and last name. - Column: last_update - Detail: last time that line in the table was updated
film.film_id: Table: film - Description: stores film data such as title, release year, length, rating, etc. - Column: film_id - Detail: a unique id that corresponds to a specific film
film.title: Table: film - Description: stores film data such as title, release year, length, rating, etc. - Column: title - Detail: the title of the film
film.description: Table: film - Description: stores film data such as title, release year, length, rating, etc. - Column: description - Detail: a brief description of the film
film.release_year: Table: film - Description: stores film data such as title, release year, length, rating, etc. - Column: release_year - Detail: the year the film was released
film.language_id: Table: film - Description: stores film data such as title, release year, length, rating, etc. - Column: language_id - Detail: an id numer that corresponds to a language
film.rental_duration: Table: film - Description: stores film data such as title, release year, length, rating, etc. - Column: rental_duration - Detail: the amout of time a film can be rented out
film.rental_rate: Table: film - Description: stores film data such as title, release year, length, rating, etc. - Column: rental_rate - Detail: the rate at which the film can be rented per unit of time.
film.length: Table: film - Description: stores film data such as title, release year, length, rating, etc. - Column: length - Detail: the length or duration of the film in minutes
film.replacement_cost: Table: film - Description: stores film data such as title, release year, length, rating, etc. - Column: replacement_cost - Detail: the amount of money it takes to replace the film if lost or damaged.
film.rating: Table: film - Description: stores film data such as title, release year, length, rating, etc. - Column: rating - Detail: the rating according to the motion picture association. This corresponds to what age group is suitable to watch this film.
film.last_update: Table: film - Description: stores film data such as title, release year, length, rating, etc. - Column: last_update - Detail: last time that line in the table was updated
film.special features: Table: film - Description: stores film data such as title, release year, length, rating, etc. - Column: special features - Detail: extra feautres the film may have such as "Deleted Scenes" or "Trailers"
film.fulltext: Table: film - Description: stores film data such as title, release year, length, rating, etc. - Column: fulltext - Detail: a list of words that describe the film and numbers that show how often they appear in the description
film_actor.film_id: Table: film_actor - Description: stores the relationships between films and actors. - Column: film_id - Detail: a unique id that corresponds to a specific film
film_actor.actor_id: Table: film_actor - Description: stores the relationships between films and actors. - Column: actor_id - Detail: a unique id that corresponds to a specific actor
film_actor.last_update: Table: film_actor - Description: stores the relationships between films and actors. - Column: last_update - Detail: last time that line in the table was updated
category.category_id: Table: category - Description: stores film's categories data. - Column: category_id - Detail: a unique id that corresponds to a specific film category
category.name: Table: category - Description: stores film's categories data. - Column: name - Detail: the name of the category such as Action or Documentary
category.last_update: Table: category - Description: stores film's categories data. - Column: last_update - Detail: last time that line in the table was updated
film_category.film_id: Table: film_category - Description: stores the relationships between films and categories. - Column: film_id - Detail: a unique id that corresponds to a specific film
film_category.category_id: Table: film_category - Description: stores the relationships between films and categories. - Column: category_id - Detail: a unique id that corresponds to a specific film category
film_category.last_update: Table: film_category - Description: stores the relationships between films and categories. - Column: last_update - Detail: last time that line in the table was updated
